tag_list: video, hypervideo, vidactio, interactivity, advertising, media
overview: Mariano Marcos is an Entrepreneur who specializes in interactive video for the web. His latest project, Vidactio, is searching for a new way for delivering non-intrusive and effective advertising on the web and Digital TV. He has intensive experience in marketing software and IT for media.

degrees.degree_type: Master in New Technologies, Audiovisual Services and Telecommunications
degrees.subject: Hi-Tech
